CustomField.description: Config is used to control the display recall link on each submitted timecard. On click it, a recall overlay will be open, where we need to enter the comment and recall the approval request for timecard.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Config is used to control the display recall link on each submitted timecard. On click it, a recall overlay will be open, where we need to enter the comment and recall the approval request for timecard.
CustomField.label: Show Recall On Timecards
